name: Friends, Crush & Lovers
description:
Friends, Crush & Lovers is a romance visual novel where you are a college freshman introduced to 5 characters as of this version by your best friend that she met over the summer in total you have 6 characters all females as of this version till I can get 6 males spirits to use to fall in love with  this version only has the intro and meeting the female characters completed the intro and meeting characters  is linear after meeting the characters  the romance visual novel will be made of choices you will have to keep a GPA of 5 to keep from getting kicked out of college every 30  in-game days the romance novel will check if you  missed any days of college if you do game over you will also have to keep a job to pay rent that is also done every in-game 30 days  please keep in mind this is the very first visual novel I have ever created so there will be grammar and might be some errors some times if you do find any please be polite and tell me in the comments so I can fix them
